```{r setup}
library(torch)
library(torchvision)
library(dogbreed)

device <- if(cuda_is_available()) "cuda" else "cpu"
```

## Dataset

```{r}
transform_train <- function(img) {
  # image to tensor
  img %>% torchvision::transform_to_tensor() %>%
    # move to the GPU (if available)
    (function(x) x$to(device = device)) %>%
    # data augmentation
    torchvision::transform_color_jitter() %>%
    torchvision::transform_random_horizontal_flip() %>%
    torchvision::transform_resize(c(224, 224)) %>%
    # normalize according to what is expected by resnet
    torchvision::transform_normalize(
      mean = c(0.485, 0.456, 0.406), 
      std = c(0.229, 0.224, 0.225)
    )
}

transform_submission <- function(img) {
  img %>%
    torchvision::transform_to_tensor() %>%
    (function(x) x$to(device = device)) %>%
    torchvision::transform_resize(c(256, 256)) %>%
    torchvision::transform_center_crop(c(224, 224))  %>%
    torchvision::transform_normalize(
      mean = c(0.485, 0.456, 0.406), 
      std = c(0.229, 0.224, 0.225)
    )
}

train <- dog_breed_dataset(
  root = "/media/athos/DATA/OneDrive/Documents/datasets/", 
  download = TRUE,
  split = "train", 
  loader = magick_loader, 
  transform = transform_train
)

submission <- dog_breed_dataset(
  root = "/media/athos/DATA/OneDrive/Documents/datasets/", 
  download = TRUE,
  split = "submission", 
  loader = base_loader, 
  transform = transform_submission
)
```

```{r}
train_dl <- dataloader(
  dataset = train, 
  batch_size = 32, 
  shuffle = FALSE,
  num_workers = 0,
  worker_globals = c("device")
)

submission_dl <- dataloader(
  dataset = submission, 
  batch_size = 32, 
  shuffle = FALSE,
  num_workers = 4,
  worker_globals = c("device")
)
```

## Model

```{r}
nn_dog <- nn_module(
  "DogNN",
  initialize = function(n_classes = 120) {
    resnet18 <- torchvision::model_resnet18(pretrained = TRUE)
    resnet18$parameters %>% purrr::walk(function(param) param$requires_grad_(FALSE))
    
    num_features <- resnet18$fc$in_features
    resnet18$fc <- torch::nn_linear(in_features = num_features, out_features = n_classes)
    self$resnet18 <- resnet18
  },
  forward = function(x) {
    x %>%
      self$resnet18()
  }
)

model <- nn_dog()$to(device = device)
print(model)
```

## Training

```{r}
set_progress_bar <- function(total) {
  progress::progress_bar$new(
    total = total, clear = FALSE, width = 70,
    format = ":current/:total [:bar] - :elapsed - loss: :loss"
  )
}

n_epochs <- 10
loss_function <- nn_cross_entropy_loss()
optimizer <- optim_sgd(model$parameters, lr = 0.1, momentum = 0.9)
scheduler <- lr_one_cycle(optimizer, max_lr = 0.05, epochs = n_epochs, steps_per_epoch = train_dl$.length())
```

```{r}
for(epoch in 1:n_epochs) {
  # progress bar for feedback
  pb <- set_progress_bar(length(train_dl))
  pb$message(glue::glue("Epoch {epoch}/{n_epochs}"))
  
  model$train()
  losses <- c()
  
  coro::loop(for(b in train_dl) {
    
    optimizer$zero_grad()
    output <- model(b[[1]]$to(device = device))
    target <- b[[2]]$to(device = device)
    loss <- loss_function(output, target)
    loss$backward()
    optimizer$step()
    scheduler$step()
    
    losses <- c(losses, loss$item())
    pb$tick(tokens = list(loss = round(mean(losses), 4)))
  })
  
  model$eval()
}
```
